column4: firing a mount command, i get this "mount.nfs: mount to NFS server 'rpcbind' failed: RPC Error: Program not registered"   already installed nfs-common, what else?
nfs-common installed portmap and the service is running?
reason i'm here, nfs-common didin't fix my problem :)
says portmap is already the newest version.
you have portmap on the server and client?
